entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
